analyzed: ▁dutiy a sīs appa cāl aka sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sīsappacālakaṁ antaraghare nisīdanti sīsaṁ olambentā …pe….
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁sīs appa cāl akaṃ ▁ antara ghar e ▁nisīd anti ▁sīs aṃ ▁ o lamb entā ▁pe
▁na ▁sīs appa cāl akaṃ ▁ antara ghar e ▁nisīd issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁na ▁sīs appa cāl akaṃ ▁ antara ghar e ▁nisīd itabbaṃ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sīsappacālakaṁ antaraghare nisīdati sīsaṁ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁sīs appa cāl akaṃ ▁ antara ghar e ▁nisīd ati ▁sīs aṃ ▁ o lamb ento ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
